item.title: Volkswagen faces historic $30 million compensation for Amazon labor abuses in Brazil
item.description: Brazil’s labor court has ordered Volkswagen to pay about $30 million for collective moral damages

item.title: Western states seek to end long-running water dispute over dwindling Rio Grande
item.description: A feud over management of one of North America's longest rivers has been simmering in the courts for years

item.title: Trump admin cancels $679 million for offshore wind projects as attacks on reeling industry continue
item.description: The Transportation Department has canceled $679 million in federal funding for a dozen offshore wind projects

item.title: Employers have used E-Verify for years. ICE's arrest of a Maine police officer raises new questions
